How about making choices that lead to less distraction and more productivity? Enrol and gain the basics of productivity using Gmail and associated insights like how best to send an email.

courseDescription:
Gmail is a popular email service. Even if you haven't heard of or used it before, this course gives a step-by-step procedure to teach you how to register. It begins by illustrating the basics of using email: composing an email, managing the signature and using spell check. After that, you will find out how to create a Google account, set up a profile picture and quickly tour the Gmail interface. Next, explore the core options, the main toolbar and inbox settings before looking at some quick locations for the theme, reading range or conversation view. The first section concludes with Gmail productivity strategies, including using advanced search, creating filters and utilising associated Google applications.

The next part starts by introducing Google settings. Whether your goal is to create a signature or autoreply, manage notifications or your account, it is all inside Google settings. At this time, you will pick up email best practices. You will discover secret strategies to make email communication fun and distraction-free. Lastly, you cannot overlook security. You will know the vital aspects of good password creation and how to use the LastPass app to increase security further.

After completing the course, you will never use an email service the same way again. You will know about settings and other possibilities that very few have seen, let alone utilised. By mastering Gmail and the tips to make email a productive endeavour, you will be on your way to more success in your personal and business ventures!
